meta.title: Nano Banana - Lightning-Fast AI Image Studio
meta.description: Design stunning visuals in seconds with Nano Banana, the AI image studio. Generate brand assets, restyle references, and remove watermarks without leaving your browser.
meta.keywords: Nano Banana, AI image studio, text to image, image-to-image, AI design tool

hero.title: Create Production-Ready Images in Seconds
hero.description:
Nano Banana fuses generation with pixel-perfect cleanup so your ideas become market-ready visuals instantly.
Generate from text, restyle with reference images, or clean existing assets with watermark removal.

announcement.label: BETA
announcement.title: üçå Nano Banana is now open for creators worldwide

hero.tip: üîí Prompts and assets stay private by default

heroGeometic.description: Experience the future of AI image editing. Nano-banana's advanced model delivers consistent character editing and scene preservation that surpasses Flux Kontext.

uploads.upload_title: Upload an image with a watermark
uploads.drag_drop_text: Drag your asset here or click to upload
uploads.click_different_file: Click to try a different image

state.auth_required: Please sign in to remove watermarks. Redirecting to login...

detectResult.result_detail: Your cleaned image will appear here.
detectResult.insufficient_credits: Not enough credits. Watermark removal costs 1 credit. Upgrade your plan to continue.
detectResult.unable_verify_credits: We couldn't verify your credits. Please try again.
detectResult.invalid_file: Unsupported file type or size. Try a PNG, JPG, or WebP under 10 MB.
detectResult.preview_failed: We couldn't generate a preview for this image.
detectResult.detection_failed: Something went wrong while removing the watermark.
detectResult.ai_generated: Success: The watermark is gone and the image is ready to download.
detectResult.human_created: Original image: Previewing your uploaded file.
detectResult.confidence_score_desc: Nano Banana runs multiple passes to blend surrounding pixels and keep edges crisp.
detectResult.ai_generated_desc: Download the high-resolution version without the original watermark artifacts.
detectResult.human_created_desc: Keep your original upload handy to compare before and after results.
detectResult.note: Results vary depending on watermark size, placement, and contrast. Upload the highest resolution asset available for best quality.
detectResult.audio_too_long: Image exceeds the maximum upload size. Please upload a file under the limit.

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Nano Banana
introduce.label: Overview
introduce.description: Nano Banana is an AI image studio that lets creative teams go from idea to polished asset in seconds.

image.alt: Designer using Nano Banana to create marketing visuals

items.title: Lightning-fast generation
items.description: Type a prompt and receive high-resolution variations in seconds.

items.title: Guided reimagining
items.description: Upload a reference image and steer new renders with style prompts and guidance strength.

items.title: Built-in privacy
items.description: Assets process securely and are never stored longer than needed for delivery.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why teams choose Nano Banana
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Ship campaigns and product visuals faster with a unified generation and cleanup workflow.

items.title: Launch campaigns faster
items.description: Turn briefs into production-ready images in minutes instead of days of manual editing.

image.alt: Marketing team launching campaign assets with Nano Banana

items.title: Protect your brand assets
items.description: Keep logos and product shots watermark-free while preserving fine detail.

image.alt: Product photography enhanced by Nano Banana

items.title: Collaborate confidently
items.description: Role-based access and audit trails ensure every edit is tracked for your team.

image.alt: Team collaborating on Nano Banana workflow

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How Nano Banana works
usage.description: Go from idea to ready-to-use asset with three simple steps:

items.title: Describe or upload your vision
items.description: Start with a text prompt or drop in a reference image, product photo, or sketch.

items.title: Fine-tune style and details
items.description: Adjust guidance, choose styles, and let Nano Banana iterate with lightning-fast previews.

items.title: Download and share instantly
items.description: Export watermark-free images ready for campaigns, storefronts, or presentations.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key features of Nano Banana
feature.description: Everything you need to ideate, generate, and refine visuals in one place.

items.title: Text-to-image generation
items.description: Create stunning concepts from natural language prompts.

items.title: Image-to-image restyling
items.description: Upload a reference and guide the transformation with prompts and control strength.

items.title: Project-ready exports
items.description: Download high-res outputs optimized for web, print, or storyboards.

items.title: Ready-to-go, watermark-free
items.description: Deliver finished assets instantly with clean exports that stay watermark-free across every channel.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked about Nano Banana
faq.description: Need something else? Reach out and we'll help you get set up.

items.title: What powers Nano Banana's generation?
items.description: We run on nano banana models tuned for speed and consistency, delivering high-fidelity renders without long wait times.

items.title: Can I upload my own assets?
items.description: Yes. Bring product photos, illustrations, or sketches. Use image-to-image to restyle them

items.title: Is my content private?
items.description: Absolutely. Uploads are encrypted in transit and deleted automatically after your outputs are delivered.

items.title: How are credits consumed?
items.description: Each text-to-image or image-to-image request costs 1 credit.
